WorkItem.ClosedComment: In 2.1.9 the gui has been changed so that it's easier to tell what's happening with imporved buffs.
WorkItem.Description: When you are comparing buffs, if you have selected the improved form of the buff, it still shows the un-improved version as being active.  I think this is only a display issue and that it is not double figuring the buffs in the actual calculations.
WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Buffs and Improved buffs both displaying

Comments.Message: This is correct, and by design. It's not double figuring the buffs in the actual calculations, and the values display are correct.
